attributes.action: PULL BRITISH TROOPS OUT OF AFGHANISTAN
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: IT seems the government has not read the history of the British conflict in Afghanistan. ""After the annihilation of British troops, Afghanistan once again becomes independent, and the exiled Amir, Dost Mohammad Khan comes back and occupies the royal throne (1843-1863)""The Russians could not defeat the Afghans and eventually pulled out of Afghanistan. We have no clear idea why our troops are in Afghanistan . Lives are being lost everyday unnecessarily.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
